roleset.name: catch in a snare
roleset.note: SNARE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'snare' based on sentences in wsj. Member of VNcls pocket-9.10. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from snare.01-v)

role.descr: explicit mention of snare (usually when metaphorical)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Also trying [*-1] to snare a portion of the $2 billion-a-year industry is [Agfa Corp., a unit of Bayer AG]-1.
example.arg: a portion of the $2 billion-a-year industry

example.name: with snare
example.text: Mary snared John with her smoldering eyes and promises of chocolate cake.
example.arg: with her smoldering eyes and promises of chocolate cake
